attributes.action: extend the child fare on all public transport to the age of 18.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Adults are always telling us (the young population of Britain) that we do not become adults until we turn 18. This is true. We do not officially become adults until we reach 18 so why should we have to pay an ADULT fare on public transport if we are NOT adults. This is wrong and just a little bit hypercritical.
